3/20/20, 2:34 PM - Vikas Vidhyarthy Civil: Corona- the teacher reminds us of our Indian traditions and age-old practices

*1. Why the bathrooms and toilets were *outside* our houses and not *inside*

*2. Why we should not touch anything or anybody when we return from a barbershop or a funeral. You may return to normalcy *only* after having a bath immediately.*

*3. Why the footwear has to be kept outside the house and not inside.*

*4. Why we have to wash our hands and feet when we returned from schools or outside after playing.*

*5. Why a mandatory 10 days isolation / quarantine (especially at a birth or death) in traditional households.*

*6. Why the households must not cook if there's a dead body inside the house.*
 
*7. Why the washing of discarded clothes has to be done outside the house and not inside.*

*8. Why was it mandatory to be clean and have bath before cooking for the house.*

*9. Why once you have had bath, you were not supposed to physically touch those who did not.*

Maintaining physical hygiene, social distance and cleanliness were laughed at, ridiculed, insulted, systematically breaking these traditions brick by brick, forcing people to discard these rituals for the fear of being isolated and *force fit* into a society blindly aping the Western way of life. 

Now, all these habits &  routines followed by our forefathers from time immemorial stand validated.👍

3/22/20, 7:17 PM - Naresh Sharma: *ग्रुप एडमिन एवं सदस्यों से माफी के साथ🙏🙏*

*"सेनेटाइजर" बनाने की विधि-* 
तो विधि इस प्रकार है.....
1 लीटर स्प्रिट (कीमत 110 रुपए)
200 ml ग्लिसरीन (60 रुपए)
एक ढक्कन डिटोल का....
महक चाहिए तो आपका पसंदीदा कोई भी इत्र चल जाएगा....
पहले  स्प्रिट व ग्लिसरीन को मिलाइये....
फिर डिटोल मिला दीजिए...
फिर यदि महक चाहिए तो इत्र मिला दीजिए
आपका सेनिटाइजर तैयार हो जाएगा...
मात्र 200 रुपए के आस-पास आपका 1200 ml सेनिटाइजर तैयार हो जाएगा....
जबकि बाजार में 100 ml का  सेनिटाइजर 100 से 150 रुपए तक मे बिक रहा है.....

✔हम लोग  "फिटकरी"से सेनेटाइजर बना सकते है...
1 लीटर पानी मे 100ग्राम "फिटकरी" डाल 1 ढक्कन "डिटोल",
गाड़ा करने के लिए "ग्लिसरीन"या "एलुविरा" मिलाकर भी "सेनिटाइजर"बना सकते है.....
घर पर तैयार कर कालाबाजारी करने वालो को जवाब दीजिए....

जगजीवन राम आजाद 
रसायन विज्ञान विभाग
डॉ बी० आर० अंबेडकर राजकीय महाविद्यालय मैनपुरी।

3/23/20, 7:57 AM - DR Sir WhatsApp No: March 23 is marked as Shaheed Diwas or Martyrs’ Day to remember the day when three brave freedom fighters were hanged by the British. Bhagat Singh, Shivaram Rajguru and Sukhdev Thapar were inspirational youngsters, and their sacrifice remained etched in the Indian conscience.  Amongst them, Bhagat Singh stood out for his bravery, clarity of thought and exceptional patriotism. On this day, we look back at Bhagat's thoughts on revolution, freedom, love and individuality.

3/23/20, 11:30 AM - +91 86301 46417: सभी भारत वासियों को सूचित किया जाता है की कोरोना महामारी तेजी से फैल रही है इसको फैलने से रोकने के लिये निम्न बातों पर अमल करे. 

👉  सुबह दूधकी थैली घर लाये हो तो थैली को तुरंत पानी से धो लें , और साबून से अपना हाथ साफ कर लें .
 👉  अखबार बंद कर दे .
👉  सब्जी लाने के बाद तुरंत नमक के पानी से धो लें .
 👉  डाक से और कोरियर से कुछ ना मंगायें , बहुत ज्यादा जरूरी हो तो मंगाये लेकिन वो डाक ट्रे मे लिजीये और कम से कम 12 घँटे बाद खोलें .
👉  ऑन लाईन कुछ दिनों तक ना मंगायें 
👉  ओला , उबर या टेक्सी का उपयोग ना करें .
👉  बच्चों को बाहर ना जाने  दें .
👉 कंम्पयूटर , लेपटॉप का उपयोग कम से कम करें .दूसरों की साइकिल  या गाडी उपयोग ना करे. 
👉   घर से बडे बुजुर्गों को निकलने ना दें . 
👉  करेंसी की अदला बदली फिलहाल टालिये. 
 👉 ATM मे हाथ दस्ताना पहन के जायें .
👉  घर के कामवाली बाई को हाथ पैर धोने के बाद ही घर में आने दें . 
👉 सार्वजनिक स्थानो एवं भीड़ -भाड़ में जाने से बचे. 
👉  हर एक घँटे में हाथ धोना ना भूलें .
👉  बहार की बनी हुई खाने की वस्तु घर में ना लायें . 

ऐसा करके हम और आप करोना को फैलने से रोक सकते है क्योंकि ये एक दूसरे के संपर्क से फैलता है .. 
कृपया आप इस पोस्ट को शेयर करके  ओरो को भी जागरूक करे.
*प्रधानमंत्री जन कल्याणकारी योजना प्रचार प्रसार अभियान इंदौर* ----------------------------

3/23/20, 8:41 PM - +91 86673 81913: Dear All,
A small recommendation from another group - seems practical to me : Use your left hand on door handles, carts, knobs, taps etc. to protect your right hand from germs. The majority of face contact is made with the right hand, if you are a right hander. Understand that they managed to spread this message widely in South Korea, which was well followed. Stay safe!!

3/23/20, 10:38 PM - Vikas Vidhyarthy Civil: This is how we fight together. (from the  news paper of 23th March)

1.  After, the notification by GoI to cap the retail prices Mask at ₹10 and hand sanitizer at ₹100 per 200 ml, leading FMCG companies such as HUL, Reckitt Benckiser, ITC, Godrej and Dabur has slashed their prices of sanitizer by upto 70%. 

2.  Leading liquor Companies like Amrut Distilleries and John Distilleries has approached the GoI license to manufacturer sanitizers. (Ethyl alcohol is a key ingredient of both liquor and sanitizer.)

3. Many technical institutes (including IITs, NITs, IACS, Pharmaceutical Science colleges) in India are already making their own senitizer.

4. Mahindra and Mahindra  has  started manufacturing ventilators in his car manufacturing factories. Internationally, Volkswagen, GM, Ford, and Tesla are already doing this.

5. The GoI, Telecommunication Companies and video streaming companies (like youtube, amazon, hotstar) are talking together and planning to temporarily migrate from HD to SD streaming. So that the load on the internet bandwidth can be reduced.

6. GoI has asked and provided funds to state governments to purchase medical equipments as per need. In addition to that he GoI has also purchased 1200 ventilators (as of 22 March) as a buffer stock in case of emergency requirement by any of the state government.

7. Mahindra Holidays will also offer its resorts as temporary care facility and hospital.

8.  The Drugs Controller General of India (DGCI) is assisting the Pharmaceutical Companies in finding a cure of CoViD-19.  The DGCI has offered 7 measures for speeding up the process from giving Fast Track approval for repurposed drug to waving animal Street and offering flexible pathway which earlier would have taken months.

9. According to the minuts of meeting held by Textile Ministry, supply order was placed for 1 million 3-ply masks. Moreover, the HLL lifecare -- the government's nodal agency for the procuring Personal Protective Equipments has floated a tender for 725000 body covers, 1.5 million N-95 masks and 1 million 3-ply masks.

10. The government has asked Defence and Atomic Research labs to join the national effort to find a solution to deal with the Covid-19 virus outbreak. The country's biotechnology, science, and technology research institutions have also been tasked to source clinical samples from any government approved clinical testing sites and do research on the virus. The decision was taken by the empowered committee for OPD 19 response led by Dr Vinod Paul member of Niti Aayog and K vijayraghavan principal scientific advisor to the government. The Pune-based National Institute of virology has already sequenced the genome of the virus -- India being 5th country to do so --  which is essential to do research on finding test drugs and vaccines.

11. The labour ministry is working on comprehensive package to provide relief to workers and employers in the organised sector, as the the covide-19 outbreak shuts factories and offices takes a toll on jobs and impact livelihoods. An announcement could be made as early as this week.

Just imagine,if there is no network, and you are unable to connect yourself with your phones,laptops,internet etc just for an hour, how the life will be in such critical situations?As internet & Mobile phones are todays most important needs,of every human being.To know about your loved ones,(near/distant) to work from your home, to buy important medicines & other things, U need Network! 📱📲📳
When most of the companies have declared work from home, Our technical/non technical team are working constantly that too from the office, sites etc.Their families are scared, in these circumstances but they can't sit at home! 3/24/20, 10:03 PM - Pankaj Varshne: I can not hold myself to share this among you all. As Currently lockdown and curfew imposed at many places. But you need to go out for daily essentials. Kindly follow these ONEs.

ONE person: Identify one adult in a family for going out. Only he or she will go out. NOBODY ELSE.

ONE dress: Use only one dress and same dress every time you go out. Use full length dress. Don't mix this dress with your other dresses. 

ONE wallet: Use only one wallet. Don't mix these currency, coins and cards with other which already are there at home.

ONE shopping bag: Use only one and same shopping bag every time. 

ONE vehicle: Use same vehicle and key. Avoid public transportation.

ONE go: Avoid going out multiple times. Finish all your work in one go.

Avoid taking mobile phone or restrict using it.

Avoid crowding and come back immediately once you finish your work.

Use your non dominant hand or elbow to open the door or push the buttons. 

Once you come back: Keep your dress, wallet, bags, keys in a separate bag. Don't mix with others. Do thorough hand wash and face wash before touching anything and anyone. Clean your mobile phone surface with sanitizer. Best is to avoid mobile phone. 

Remember, we CAN'T AVOID exposure but we CAN REDUCE exposure.🙏

3/25/20, 8:19 AM - Swati Bhatt: Dear Colleagues ,
You can set new habits in 21 days.  Following are some list of habits for your reference:
1. Bird Gazing 
2. Suryanamskar 
3. Pranayam 
4. Yoga 
5. Reading 
6. Writing ( Blog / Book / Presentation )
7. Meditation
8. Using Advance English Vocabulary 
9. Listening Motivational Speech 
10. Public Speaking Skills 
11. Video Editing Skills 
12. Building one Technical Skill 

Make a Discipline and follow it. Do help your spouse / partner in household activities .

इसबार माँ दुर्गा चैत्र शुक्लपक्ष की प्रतिपदा ( प्रथम नवरात्र )   अर्थार्त 25 मार्च 2020 बुधवार को नोका पर सवार होकर आ रहीं हैं   जोकि शुभ माना जाता है   और मान्यता यह भी है कि जब प्रथम नवरात्र बुधवार को हो  तो माँ दुर्गा नोका पर सवार होकर आती हैं  और जगत की सब महामारियों का नाश कर   आरोग्यता, हरियाली, सुखसमृदि, और अच्छी वर्षा का वर प्रदान कर भवसागर से पार करती हैं   माँ भगवती ने चाहा तो करोना जैसी महामारी की उल्टी गिनती 25 मार्च से होनी शुरू हो जायेगी    अपनी और से पूर्ण सावधानी बरतें     आपका जीवन सदैव आनंदमय और खुशहाल हो    
*ऐसी कामना के साथ आपको आने वाले नवरात्रों की हार्दिक शुभकामनाएं*

सर्वे सन्तु निरामयाः।
सर्वे भद्राणि पश्यन्तु
‌मा कश्चिद् दुःखभाग्भवेत्।।

प्रभु श्रीराम समस्त प्राणियों का कल्याण करें, माँ भगवती जगज्जननी जगदम्बा माँ अनुग्रह से प्रजा के सभी कष्टों व रोगों का निवारण करें सब पर माता रानी का आशिर्वाद बना रहे ।

3/25/20, 7:03 PM - +91 93594 33999: कविता                                                                                                                           
ओ मुसाफिर ठहर जरा, 
कोरोना की आंधी आई है। 
आंचल मे समेटे बर्बादी, 
 मानव की तबाही लाई है।            
तु छुप जा कहीं किसी बंकर में, 
गर इससे बचना है तुझको। 
  वरना तो ये जान ले तु,     
    कि ये तुझको ही लेने आई है। 
      नहीं है ये वो आधीं, 
        जो आखों से दिखाई देगी। 
      धोखे से ये तुझको, 
        अपने साथ उड़ा ले जायेगी। 
फिर पुकारेगा तु सबको, 
          कोई नहीं बचाने आयेगा। 
     जो भी बचाने आयेगा, 
             ये उसको ही ले जायेगी। 
      इसलिए मेरी तु बात मान ले, 
   तु छुप जा कहीं कुछ पल के  लिए। जब उतर जायेगी ये आधीं, 
फिर चलना तु अपनी मजिलं के लिए। अरे मजिलं तो फिर भी मिल जायेगी,   
       पर जीवन नहीं मिलेगा ये। 
ये जीवन का फूल गर टूट गया, 
तो दोबारा नहीं खिलेगा ये।। 
           ओ मुसाफिर****

 From March 23 to April 3 we must take care of ourselves as we will be
 at the peak of the virus is two weeks, normally in those two weeks all infected will appear then there are two weeks of calm and then two weeks where it decreases.

3/28/20, 9:28 AM - Dhowmya Office: Details of CCC training for II YEAR
Only CSE & IT Departments:

CCC shall provide online module to students on “Competitive Professional Skills - 1” latest by 31st March 2020.

An email will be triggered to all students for Activation of their Accounts from operations@ccc.training.
Students can login to this course (icode.ccc.training) and start to learn & practice the coding sub-modules within the course.

Practice Assessments and also Actual Assessments shall be done using the same Platform.

Only 545 students of II year CSE& IT took the first  assessment on 16-2-2020 and only their details are available. For others to join now, a Google form will be created in the same platform.students  can fill the same and join now


Secondly, CCC is coming up with a plan to complete the rest of the course through webinar sessions. (24hrs of training split into 6 hrs across 4 days)

Plan of action shall be shared shortly (latest by 31st March 2020) Dean sir's approval.

3/28/20, 6:51 PM - +91 88600 21873: Someone gave a suggestion on "Interact with Prime Minister"

Majority of people are fasting as it is Navratri and always give gifts and money to Kanjaks on Ashtmi and Navami. This year we have no option so depending on the number of kanjaks we give gift to, all of us can donate the same amount in Pradhan Mantri fund, either through paytm or NEFT(Govt. can issue the number). I give it to 11 girls and everyone gives minimum Rs. 11, thus making it 11x11=Rs. 121. If one person will give Rs. 121 then even if only 2 crore people(out of 130 crores) donate, it will make Rs. 242,00,00,000.(Rs. Two Hundred Forty Two Crores) for Corona Victims/Poor people. 

No load on a single person but together we can bring a huge difference

"Iss baar...Desh ke liye Navratri🙂"

3/28/20, 10:41 PM - Vikas Vidhyarthy Civil: चीन ने धोखा देकर आर्थिक विश्व विजय हासिल कर ली है।

उसने सबसे पहले कोरोना वायरस की वैक्सीन बनाई और तब तक अपने फ्रिजों में रखी जब तक पूरे विश्व की आर्थिक अर्थव्यवस्था को पाताल में नहीँ उतार दिया। चीन पूरी दुनिया के इन्वेस्टर्स का हब बन गया था। 
चीन ने अपने वुहान शहर में इस वायरस को छोडा और जबरदस्त मौतों के कारण भागते इन्वेस्टर्स के शेयरों को कौडी के भाव खरीद  लिये और  विदेशी निवेशक और उद्यमी अपनी पूंजी छोड़ कर भाग गये चीन ने अपने द्वारा पहले से बनाई और छुपा कर रखी गई वैक्सीन को बाहर निकाल लिया और एक ही दिन में चीन हो रही मौतों को रोक दिया। इस युद्ध में चीन ने अपने कुछ लोग खोये पर पूरी दुनिया की दौलत लूट ली।आज वहाँ एक भी मौत नहीँ हुइ और न ही एक भी मरीज की संख्या बढी ।आज ये वायरस पूरी दुनिया में काल की तरह चक्कर लगा रहा है।
कमाल ये भी देखिये उन सभी देशों और शहरों की कमर टूट गई है जहाँ पर चीनी 
नागरिक खर्च करते थे। आज पूरा विश्व 
हर रोज अपनी अर्थव्यवस्था को ध्वस्त होते देख रहा है। पर 17 मार्च सै चीन की अर्थव्यवस्था दिनों दिन मजबूत हो रही है। 
ये एक आर्थिक युद्ध है जिसमें चीन जीत चुका है और विश्व कुदरत से युद्ध करते करते रोज अपने जान माल को गंवा रहा है। 
ये भारत के लोगों का इम्यून है कि वह हर संकट में कुशल यौद्धा की तरह लडता है और जीतता है।हमारे देश के अधिकांश नागरिक इकनोमी के आकंडो में नहीँ फसते, पत्थर में से 
पानी निकालने की कुव्वत रखते हैं। हम भारतीय बडे से बडे 
रोग को रोटी के टुकड़े में लपेट कर खाने और पचाने में 
माहिर हैं। हम कभी कुदरत के विरुद्ध  युद्ध नहीँ करते बल्कि उसकी पूजा करते हैं। हम भारतीय मन्दिरों ,गुरुद्वारों से आवाज दे दे कर बुलाते हैं ईश्वर को 
रिझाते हैं अतः वो ईश्वर हमारा अनिष्ट कर ही नहीँ सकता।
पर हर भारतीय को
याद रखना चाहिए कि चीन और चीनी इस कुदरत के खल नायक है इनसे हर प्रकार की दूरी बनाए 
रखें।
वुहान से शंघाई = 839 km
वुहान से बीजिंग = 1152 km
वुहान से मिलान = 15000 km
वुहान से न्यूयॉर्क = 15000 km

पास के बीजिंग/ शंघाई में कोरोना का कोई प्रभाव नहीं 
लेकिन इटली, ईरान, यूरोप देशों में लोगों की मृत्यु और पूरे विश्व की अर्थव्यवस्था बर्बाद.

चीन के सभी व्यापारिक क्षेत्र सुरक्षित

कुछ तो गड़बड़ है,
अमेरिका ऐसे ही नहीं चीन को दोष दे रहा.
मित्रों झूठी अफवाहों के बहकावे में आकर अपना धैर्य न खोएं। पोस्ट को शेयर कर सभी तक सही जानकारी प्रेषित करैं। आपका विवेक और धैर्य ही आपका साथी है। ईश्वर और सरकार पर भरोसा रखें। घर में  रहैं, सुरक्षित रहैं। 
... शुभकामनाएंँ ।

 चीन से 10 कड़े सवाल : (सवाल नं 6,7,8,9 अवश्य पढ़ें)

1) जहां पूरी दुनिया इससे प्रभावित हो रही है, वहीं चीन में वुहान के अलावा यह क्यों कहीं नहीं फैला? चीन की राजधानी आखिर इससे अछूती कैसे रह गयी? 

2) प्रारंभिक अवस्था में चीन ने पूरी दुनिया से इस वायरस के बारे में क्यों छुपाया?

3)  कोरोना के प्रारंभिक सैंपल को नष्ट क्यों किया?

4) इसे सामने लाने वाले डॉक्टर और पत्रकार को खामोश क्यों किया? पत्रकार को तो गायब ही कर दिया गया है?

5)  दुनिया के अन्य देशों ने जब सूचना साझा करने को कहा तो उसने सूचना साझा क्यों नहीं किया? मना क्यों किया? 

6) कोरोना मानव से मानव में फैलता है, इसे छुपाने के लिए WHO  के कम्युनिस्ट निदेशक का उपयोग क्यों किया गया? WHO के निदेशक जनवरी में "बीझिंग (चीन)" में क्या कर रहे थे ..... ?????? (प्लान फिक्सिंग कर रहे थे क्या?)

7) "किसी भी अंतरराष्ट्रीय उड़ान के लिए कोई गाइडलाइन जारी करने की जरूरत नहीं है, क्योंकि यह मानव से मानव में नहीं फैलता है" ....ऐसा ट्वीट 11 जनवरी तक WHO करता रहा । क्यों ???  आज साबित हो गया कि कोरोना मानव से मानव में फैलता है... तो फिर WHO ने झूठ क्यों बोला ????

8) वुहान से एकसाथ 50,00,000 लोगों को बिना मेडिकल जांच किए "दुनिया के अलग-अलग हिस्से में" क्यों भेजा गया ..???  

9) इटली में 6 फरवरी तक मामूली केस था। एकाएक चीनी 'हम चीनी हैं वायरस नहीं, हमें गले लगाइए।' प्लेकार्ड के साथ दुनिया के पर्यटन स्थल 'सिटी ऑफ लव' के नाम से मशहूर इटली के लोगों को गले लगाने क्यों पहुंचे ???

10) पूरी दुनिया  आज चीन और WHO को संदेह की नजर से देख रही है और ताज्जुब देखिए कि एक ही दिन चीन और WHO, दोनों भारत की तारीफ में उतर आए! क्या यह महज संयोग है? 

11)  और इसके अगले ही दिन भारत में चीन के राजदूत ट्वीट कर उम्मीद करते हैं कि भारत इंटरनेशनल कम्युनिटी में उसकी पैरवी करे। आखिर क्यों? नेहरू की एक गलती का खामियाजा हम भुगत चुके हैं। यह मोदी सरकार है, और उम्मीद है वह कम से कम वह गलती तो नहीं ही दोहराएगी? 

12) सार्क से लेकर G-20 तक की बैठक पीएम मोदी के कहने पर हो रही है‌। संकट के समय भारत वर्ल्ड लीडर के रूप में उभरा है। इटली, जर्मनी, स्पेन, फ्रांस, ब्रिटेन, अमेरिका तक जब कैरोना से निबटने में असफल हो रहे हैं तो पीएम मोदी की पहल पर भारत इससे कहीं बेहतर तरीके से डील कर रहा है। 

चीन इसी का फायदा उठाकर यह चाहता है कि भारत इंटरनेशनल कम्युनिटी में उसके अछूतपन को दूर करे। अब यह नहीं होगा।  चीन संदेह के घेरे में है और रहेगा!


 (जरूर पढ़े)
 🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥

 दुनिया पर हावी होने का तरीका ??

 चीनी रणनीति:-

 1. सबसे पहले एक वायरस और उसकी दवा बनाई।

 2. फिर वायरस फैलाया।

 3. अपनी दक्षता का प्रदर्शन करते हुए रातों- रात अस्पतालों का निर्माण करवा लिया (आखिरकार वे पहले से ही तैयार थे) परियोजनाओं के साथ साथ उपकरण का आदेश देना, श्रम, पानी और सीवेज नेटवर्क को किराए पर लेना, पूर्वनिर्मित निर्माण सामग्री और एक प्रभावशाली मात्रा में स्टॉक.. यह सब उस रणनीति का हिस्सा थे।

 4. परिणामस्वरूप दुनिया में वायरस के साथ साथ अराजकता फैलने लगी, खास कर के यूरोप में।

 5. दर्जनों देशों की अर्थव्यवस्था त्वरित रूप से प्रभावित हुई।

 6. अन्य देशों के कारखानों में उत्पादन लाइनें बंद हो गई।

 7. फलस्वरूप शेयर बाजार में ज़बरदस्त गिरावट।

 8. चीन ने अपने देश में महामारी को जल्दी से नियंत्रित कर लिया। रातों रात वुहान से कोरोना के नए मरीज मिलना बन्द ही हो गए। यह कैसे सम्भव है जबकि इटली जैसा देश इस स्थिति को नहीं सम्भाल पर रहा है। आखिरकार, चीन पहले से ही तैयार था।

 9. परिणाम स्वरूप उन वस्तुओं की कीमत कम हो गई, जिनसे वह बड़े पैमाने पर तेल आदि खरीदता हैं।

 10. फिर चीन तुरन्त ही उत्पादन करने के लिए वापस जुट गया, जबकि दुनिया एक ठहराव पर है। जहां एक ओर दुनिया में हाहाकार मचा हुआ है, वहीं चीन ने अपनी फैक्ट्रियों में काम शुरू करवा दिया है? चीन उन चीजों को खरीदने लगा जिनकी कीमत में भारी गिरावट हो गई थी और उनको बेचने लगा जिनकी कीमत में ज़बरदस्त इजाफा हुआ है।


अब यदि विश्वास ना हो रहा हो तो...
1999 में, चीनी उपनिवेशों किआओ लियांग और वांग जियांगसुई के द्वारा लिखी गई पुस्तक, "अप्रतिबंधित युद्ध: अमेरिका को नष्ट करने के लिए चीन का मास्टर प्लान" को पढ़ लें!!* ये सब तथ्य वहाँ मौजूद है।

 🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥
 
ज़रा इस बारे में सोचिए...

 कैसे रूस और उत्तर कोरिया कोविड 19 याने कोरोना से पूरी तरह से मुक्त हैं? क्योंकि वे चीन के कट्टर सहयोगी हैं।  इन 2 देशों से एक भी मामले की सूचना नहीं मिली।  दूसरी ओर दक्षिण कोरिया / यूनाइटेड किंगडम / इटली / स्पेन और एशिया गंभीर रूप से प्रभावित हैं। क्योंकि ये सब चीन के प्रतिस्पर्धी है..
 
कैसे हुआ वुहान अचानक घातक वायरस से मुक्त?

चीन यह कहेगा कि उनके प्रारंभिक उपाय बहुत कठोर थे और वुहान को अन्य क्षेत्रों में फैलाने के लिए बंद याने लोकडाउन कर दिया गया था। परन्तु ये जवाब बड़ा ही  मजाकिया है..ऐसा होता तो बाकी के देशों में भी यह इतना नहीं फैलता और एक शहर तक ही सीमित रहता। यह 100% सत्य है कि वे वायरस के एंटी डोड का उपयोग कर रहे हैं।

 बीजिंग में कोई क्यों नहीं मारा गया? केवल वुहान ही क्यों?  दिलचस्प विचार है ये ...खैर, वुहान अब व्यापार के लिए खुल गया है। अमेरिका और उपर्युक्त सभी देश आर्थिक रूप से तबाह हैं।  जल्द ही अमेरिकी अर्थव्यवस्था चीन की योजना के अनुसार ढह जाएगी।  चीन जानता है कि वह अमेरिका को सैन्य रूप से नहीं हरा सकता क्योंकि वर्तमान में इस हिसाब से अमरीका विश्व में सबसे बड़ा ताकतवर देश है।

तो यह है चीन का विश्व विजय फार्मूला...वायरस का उपयोग करें दूसरे देशों की अर्थव्यवस्था और रक्षा क्षमताओं को पंगु बनाने के लिए। निश्चित ही नैन्सी पेलोसी को इसमें एक सहायक बनाया गया था कारण था ट्रम्प को टक्कर देने के लिए। राष्ट्रपति ट्रम्प हमेशा यह बताते रहे है कि कैसे ग्रेट अमेरिकन अर्थव्यवस्था सभी मोर्चों में सुधार कर रही है।  AMERICA GREAT AGAIN बनाने की उनकी दृष्टि को नष्ट करने का एकमात्र तरीका आर्थिक तबाही था।  नैन्सी पेलोसी ट्रम्प के खिलाफ महाभियोग लाने में असमर्थ थी।  .... इसलिए चीन के साथ मिलकर एक वायरस जारी करके ट्रम्प को नष्ट करने का यह तरीका उन्होंने अपनाया। वुहान तो महामारी का सिर्फ एक प्रदर्शन था...अब ये वायरस महामारी को चरम पर ले जा चुका है!!!

चीन के राष्ट्रपति शी जिनपिंग उन प्रभावी क्षेत्रों का दौरा करने के लिए बस एक साधारण RM1 फेसमास्क पहन कर पहुंचे थे राष्ट्रपति के रूप में उन्हें सिर से पैर तक ढंका जाना चाहिए ..... लेकिन ऐसा नहीं था।  वायरस से किसी भी तरह के नुकसान का विरोध करने के लिए उन्हें पहले ही इंजेक्शन लगाया गया था। इसका मतलब है कि वायरस के निकलने से पहले ही उसका इलाज चल रहा था।

अब यदि आप तर्क दें कि - बिल गेट्स ने पहले ही 2015 में एक वायरस फैलने की भविष्यवाणी कर दी थी ... इसलिए चीनी एजेंडा सच नहीं हो सकता।  तो उत्तर है- हाँ, बिल गेट्स ने भविष्यवाणी की थी लेकिन वह भविष्यवाणी एक वास्तविक वायरस के प्रकोप पर आधारित थी ना की मानव जनित। अब चीन यह भी बता रहा है कि वायरस का पहले से ही अनुमान था ताकि इसका एजेंडा उस भविष्यवाणी से मेल खा सके और सब कुछ प्राकृतिक या स्वतः प्रकिया लगे। अभी भी यदि यह प्रमाणिक तथ्य आपको बनावटी लगता है तो आगे स्वयं देखियेगा... चीन का अगला कदम गिरती हुई आर्थिक अर्थव्यवस्था के कगार का सामना करने वाले देशों से अब स्टॉक खरीद कर विश्व अर्थव्यवस्था को अपने नियंत्रण में करना होगा...  बाद में चीन यह घोषणा करेगा कि उनके मेडिकल शोधकर्ताओं ने वायरस को नष्ट करने का इलाज ढूंढ लिया है।
अब चीन के पास अपनी सेनाओं के शस्त्रागारों में अन्य देशों के स्टॉक हैं और ये देश जल्द ही मजबूरी में अपने मालिक के गुलाम होंगे !!

और हां, एक बात और...
जिस चीनी डॉक्टर ने इस वायरस का खुलासा किया था, वह भी चीनी अधिकारियों द्वारा हमेशा के लिए खामोश कर दिया गया....
विचारणीय
🤔🤔🤔

जो हमारे देश पर परेशानी आइ है

3/29/20, 6:06 PM - Anna Alphy: Ist hand information
Dear friends
Our Doctor who recovered from Corona illness and recovered in double quick time had inhaled Steam.
The doctors at IDH Corona centre too are continually inhaling steam.

Steaming raises the temperature of lungs, throat and mouth so that if the virus is already there it gets inactivate due to high temperature.

Yes that’s true as viruses sit in the throat first. 

That’s why even if there is someone sneezing in your office and you come home and inhale and gargle with warm water and salt, usually you will not get the flu. 

I recommend for everyone who is able to do it - 
1. Use steam inhalation everyday - morning and evening if possible,
2. Gargle with warm water and salt daily - morning and evening if possible.

This is a good daily practice which will improve your overall well-being and can be continued even after COVID19 ends.

Please also pass this information for the benefit of others.

3/30/20, 7:52 AM - +91 74286 22961: *Know yourself with Durga(The goddess of Strength)*
When she decides to reach her goal, she reaches it. She is a winner. 

》DURGA represents the ideal female or the Mother of the the Universe. She is called in Sanskrit JAGAT JANANI.

Durga is also reffered as “Triyambake,” the three eyed Goddess. The left eye represents the Moon (Desire); the right eye represents the Sun (action): and the central eye fire (knowledge). Lord Shiva, her spouse also possesses three eyes. we all have knowledge. Know your knowledge through Yoga.

The woman sitting on the tiger signifies the calming of the Male Ego, (the roaring Tiger). It is common knowledge that when the man is angry, he can become a predator like the tiger, he can potentially destroy the woman. The duty of the woman at that point is to calm his ego down and make the tiger qualities in him die, resulting in a DEAD tiger skin.

》We all are connected to God.The CONCH SHELL symbolizes the “Pranava” or “Om”, which indicates her connection to God in the form of sound.

The TRISHUL represents Mother’s ability to remove the three types of misery – physical, mental and spiritual. A mother’s touch is very comforting. A wife has the ability to soothe her family whenever faced with challenges. She controls all three worlds – HEAVEN, HELL, and EARTH.

Durga is depicted with eight or ten arms. This is a representation of the eight qundrants or ten directions in Hinduism which indicates her protection from all directions to devotees.

The SUDARSHAN CHAKRA or the Circular WHEEL OF TIME indicates that all life is born through the female (Durga) and that life cannot enter this world without coming through the female.

Be Healthy Be Happy.

Few lessons learnt in past few days: 

 1. United States is no longer the world's leading country.
 2. China won the 3rd World War without firing a missile and no one could handle it.
 3. Europeans are not as educated as they appear.
4. We can survive vacations without trips to Europe and USA.
5. Rich people are in fact less immune than the poor.
 6. Human beings are opportunistic and despicable no matter their socioeconomic position when prices are rising.
7. No priest, poojari, Imam,  Pope or God saved patients .
 8. Humans are the real viruses on the planet.
9. We can spend Billions of Rupees on poor without red tapism.
10. Health professionals are worth more than a footballer.
11. Oil is worthless in a society without consumption.
12. How animals feel in the zoo.
13. The planet  regenerates quickly without humans into play.
14. Majority of people can work from home.
15. We and the kids can survive without junk food.
16. Prisoners in jails for petty crimes can be released.
17. Living a hygienic life is not difficult.
18. Only women are not supposed to know cooking.
19. There are a lot of good people in the World.
20. If you build more schools, you have to construct less hospitals.
21. Media is bullshit.

4/3/20, 1:25 PM - Vikas Vidhyarthy Civil: I don't know who wrote this, but it's beautiful.. ♥

We fell asleep in one world, and woke up in another.

Suddenly Disney is out of magic,
Paris is no longer romantic,
New York doesn't stand up anymore,
the Chinese wall is no longer a fortress, and Mecca is empty.

Hugs & kisses suddenly become weapons, and not visiting parents & friends becomes an act of love.

Suddenly you realise that power, beauty & money are worthless, and can't get you the oxygen you're fighting for.

The world continues its life and it is beautiful. It only puts humans in cages. I think it's sending us a message:

"You are not necessary. The air, earth, water and sky without you are fine. When you come back, remember that you are my guests. Not my masters."

4/6/20, 7:44 AM - +91 99585 15757: India seems to be coronavirus free even though it is a close neighbor of China. 

There is a lot of speculation and eyebrows raised as to why this is so. 

Various reasons are being put out:

1) The Indian gene is Covid-19 resistant.
2) The low level of hygiene has made Indians immune to this virus.
3) The Indian curry might have ingredients that are antiviral.
4) Maybe the high level of chillies in our food help prevent lung infection by C-19.
5) The Indian habit of washing their hands and everything else may play a role.
6) Most Indians eat hot food and do not share their food. This prevents spread of infection.
7) The "Namaste"  helps, as people don't touch each other.
8) India has a warmer climate that is killing the C-19.
9) Indians are a lot vegetarian and even the non vegetarians can switch to vegetables. The meat eating has drastically dropped in India after the C-19 scare as per statistics.

In fact WHO and China are really wondering and trying to understand how a country of 1.38 billion can be coronavirus free ! 
God only knows and hope it stays this way.

🙂❤

4/10/20, 1:54 PM - Chandra Madam: As directed by DR sir,

Dear  Faculty Members,

"We are in  the noble profession of grooming students to a better future.

We have to implement  those values we teach, in practical also.

We have to keep  ourselves presentable especially, during the  meetings and interactions,  because our own  children are also watching us at the time.

 I expect that, during the next meeting all the faculties will be in the  presentable attire.

We need active participation of all the faculty members by put forth thier suggestions and opinions to increase the admission.

Faculties must think about  for the institution, since admission is a major mandate placed on us.

Hence, you  should come out with your ideas to publicize the virtues of our campus.

*(Without decent admission count, this year things may not be as smooth as it has been in the past two years)*

I hope to see some changes in the upcoming meeting on next Thursday ( 16.4.2020)."

Further, sending the protocol to follow during the video conference or meeting and hope all will follow as mentioned.

4/14/20, 12:19 PM - +91 99999 90901: जानिए आरोग्य सेतु एप क्या है
इसे install करना क्यों आवश्यक है

आपमें से बहुतों ने इनस्टॉल किया
पर आपको लगा कि बेकार है
इसे आपने uninstall भी कर दिया होगा

मैंने भी दो तीन बार install किया फिर हटा दिया
पर मोदी जी ने फिर से बोला तो सोचना पड़ा 
ये जरूर कोई बहुत बड़ी चीज है

आप भी फिर से आरोग्य सेतु एप को install कीजिए
मोदी जी ने चार बार आपसे निवेदन किया है

अब जानिए..

यह एप्प आपसे कुछ पूछता है जैसे कि क्या आपको खांसी है
बुखार है
सांस लेने में परेशानी है

निश्चित है आप लिखेंगे
नहीं है

उसके बाद आप ग्रीन जोन में दिखते होंगे
आपको लगता होगा
इस एप्प में कुछ है ही नहीं
पूरा बकवास है

यह एप्प ब्लू टूथ और लोकेशन को ऑन रखने को कहता है
आप always on रखिये

जब भी आप किसी भीड़ भाड़ वाली जगह पर जाते हैं
यह एप्प ब्लू टूथ से आस पास के मोबाइल से संदेश लेता देता रहता है

जब आप किसी के पास खड़े हैं तो आप भी ग्रीन जोन के हैं
पास खड़ा व्यक्ति भी ग्रीन जोन वाला नार्मल व्यक्ति ही है
पर अगर वह व्यक्ति आज से 10 दिनों बाद किसी कारण से कोरोना पॉजिटिव हो जाएगा
तो यह एप्प आपको तुरंत alert कर देगा
और आपका ग्रीन कलर बदल कर ऑरेंज या पीला हो जाएगा

यह कहेगा
आप दूध लेने आज से 10 दिन पहले डेयरी पर गए थे
वह व्यक्ति जो नीले शर्ट वाला था
वह अब कोरोना पॉजिटिव है
यानी 10 दिन पहले उसे छिपा हुआ संक्रमण था जो अब साफ साफ दिखने लगा है

अब आप तुरंत अपनी जांच कराइए
साथ ही यह एप्प उन सभी व्यक्तियों को सूचना दे देगा
आप सभी लोग उस आदमी के चलते danger zone में आ गए हैं
तुरंत जांच कराइये

सबकी लोकेशन ऑन रहने से उन सभी की मूवमेंट भी पता चलेगी
और कोरोना से लड़ना आसान होगा

आप इस पोस्ट को व्हाट्सएप्प पर भेजिए
लोगों को समझाइए
जिस दिन करोड़ों लोग इसे install कर लेंगे
यह आपके किसी भी ऑरेंज जोन के व्यक्ति के पास जाते ही रिंग करने लगेगा
यह आपको हॉट स्पॉट की सूचना अलार्म से दे देगा 
ताकि आप रास्ता बदल लें

Thanks & Regards

4/20/20, 6:09 PM - Dr Amit Goel Mech HOD: Dear Colleagues,
 On account of data aggregation on the Virtual Class Activities, it is planned to use the Academia Portal (official academic erp in KTR).
 As an initial process, all the faculty members of RMP,NCR,CDP campuses are to be onboarded to the portal through an official invitation email.
 I've attached the instructions of the onboarding process and gaining access to the Academia Portal along with this email. Please go through the instructions and follow the same to onboard the portal.
 It is just is in 3 simple steps,
1. You will receive an official invite from the mail: engage.et@srrmist.edu.in
2. You have to accept the invitation and create your own password
3. Access the Academia portal through the url: creator.zoho.com

Detailed instructions are attached for your reference.

Email invitations will be sent by today 7pm. The invitation mail will be active for 6 hours. So please activate your account. You may update data after receiving our instructions.

Welcome to Academia !!

The campus coordinators will help you in specific issues. The details of the campus coordinators are,
Ramapuram Campus

1.      Mr. Gowtham Sethupathi, CSE, 9952668301, gowthamm1@srmist.edu.in

2.      Mr. Pradeep Doss, ECE, 9952048600, pradeepm1@srmist.edu.in

3.      Mr. Kannan, Maths, 9940224041, kannanm1@srmist.edu.in

regards,
AK

4/22/20, 8:30 PM - DR Sir WhatsApp No: Dear members of SRM family.

Congratulations 🎉🎉🎉

Today we have reached  yet another milestone in the growth of our campus, *ONLINE APPLICATION* facility has been added to our *website www.srmimt.net.* 

 I request our faculty members to encourage the potential candidates to apply through the website of NCR campus.
The faculty members have been making many valuable additions during our meetings. 
Their suggestions are well taken and appreciated. One after the other the  ideas shall  be implemented and the introduction of online application is the first execution of a potential goal.
 *I thank and congratulate all our faculty members for their contribution.* 

Deputy Registrar

4/23/20, 10:42 PM - Chandra Madam: Dear all, 

It  is viewed with concern that some of the participants have not adhered to the instructions / etiquette circulated on the subject during the recent zoom conferences .  

In the best interests of  the Institution,  it is expected that such meetings are conducted in a professional manner with utmost  respect and sincerity to the proceedings. 

All participants are hereby requested to go through the circular and ensure strict compliance in all future meetings.

 HoDs are requested to observe deviations if any and take appropriate actions as deemed necessary.

 It is needless to emphasize that such meetings would be highly productive  if all participants adapt professional approach.

4/28/20, 7:20 PM - DR Sir WhatsApp No: Dear SRM family members.

For the past few days my self and all the dean's  in continuous interactions with our faculties as well as students.

I am exhilarated to receive amazing suggestions rendered during such meetings.

Faculty members showed immense enthusiasm offering productive ideas on how to improve admissions and strategies that can be adapted. 
I am extremely hopeful that with such a dedicated team of faculties we will easily be able to achieve our admission target this year.
I thank and appreciate all such faculties who contributed competently during the meetings.
Thanks
With regards

DAY 14: Understand Artificial Intelligence (AI) - Part 2

DAY 15: Assessment

To Register Click: https://learning.tcsionhub.in/courses/career-edge/

I really appreciate that all are working for admission with full zeal and zest by calling the candidates and forwarding a positive word for SRMIST, Delhi NCE Campus. I also perceived the truth that faculties working out of box and convincing them to opt for the courses available at our campus.
As you all know, our academic session is over. Now we need to gear up to work more to achieve the target of  1560 admissions in our campus.
All facilities are getting 50 students data on daily basis. I request you all that please take this task very seriously. Moreover, please send SMS, leaflet of three pages /flyers that elaborates admission related information to all the potential admission seekers identified during the calling process.
Follow up of the interested candidates/  parents is very crucial so that they turn up for admissions.  Under the guidance of Dean Sir, DR Sir, Dean Admissions and Dean Campus life we need to work as a team and put our best to achieve the target.  Looking forward for your cooperation. 
Regards.
Pankaj Singh

5/7/20, 7:09 PM - Chandra Madam: Dear all,
 
I am pleased to inform all of you,  that as directed by Deputy Registrar and Dean Admissions, SRMIST, Ghaziabad UP, the procedure to send the students calling data has been formulated as given below with effect 11th May 2020.
 
 
 1.  250 students calling data will be sent to you  per week.

2.  The calling has to be made from Monday to Friday.

3. Calling need not be done on Saturday and Sunday and it will be  considered  as “Holiday ” for all.

4. You are required to make a “ 50” call on daily basis on the days as mentioned above.

5. The 50 calls report has to be sent to your respective HODs ( Both “Interested and whole Data) on daily basis.

6. The data will be sent to you on every Sunday for calling.
 
Your Support and cooperation is highly appreciable in this regard.

5/13/20, 11:16 PM - Priyamvada Purohit: Dear all,
IIT Bombay is organising a ONE DAY WORKSHOP ON "Effective and Efficient Online Teaching in the Age of Corona: A Hands-On Workshop" on Saturday, 16 May 2020. This workshop is being organised by the NMEICT IIT Bombay, an initiative of the MHRD, GOI.

There is NO registration fee for the workshop and certificates will be awarded on successful completion of the workshop.

First of all you need to create your account with NMEICT IITB. In the registration page, 'Maharashtra' should be selected as the state and 'Indian institute of Technology Bombay' as the remote centre. The last date for registration is 14 May 2020, 12.30 pm.

For registration and programme details, please visit NMEICT IITB website:
http://www.it.iitb.ac.in/nmeict/workshopContent.html?workshopid=NmjXBzy7AV7-qYJfYD6D2Q&category=ryjCPtOBugIe3qrCMGqopQ

Thanks & Regards,
Dr Arabinda Sharma

 *The talk was extremely well received by all the participants. The Professor handled the topic in a very simplistic way and explained the concepts giving day to day examples. The professional approach of the speaker made us feel that the talk was happening in person and limitations of the physical distance was not felt. *

The talk covered Computationa Systems,III-posed Problems..etc.. 

*The talk lasted for 50 minutes and was concluded by addressing the queries of the participants.*

5/21/20, 4:01 PM - DR Sir WhatsApp No: You are invited to a *Faculty Learning Programme*, by Business Standard Learning webinar. 

*When: May 25, 2020 03:00 PM * 

*Topic: Post COVID world : Skills & Strategies for the Faculty *

_Register in advance for this webinar:_

https://us02web.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_JYrBvOugRHK8jr62WZ0hyw 


After registering, you will receive a confirmation email containing information about joining the webinar.

Limited capacity event. Please join the webinar on time.


*Webinar Speaker:*

*Prof Dr M J Xavier* (Founding Director, IIM-Ranchi,  Professor & Chairperson, Mgmnt Devl Centre, LIBA )- An eminent academician, Prof. M J Xavier obtained his Doctorate in Management from  IIM, Calcutta and has been a teacher, trainer and consultant for over 35 years. He has authored three books and published more than 100 articles in Journals and Magazines in India and Abroad. His book `Marketing in the New Millennium’ won the DMA- Escorts Award for the Best Management Book of the Year 1999. He has taught in premier Institutions like IIM Bangalore, XLRI Jamshedpur and IFMR Chennai. He has served as Visiting Faculty to a number of business schools in India and abroad including The University of Buckingham, U.K., Post Graduate Institute of Management, Sri Lanka, American University of Armenia in Armenia, The Texas Christian University, U.S.A., California Polytechnic State University, U.S.A. and S P Jain Institute of Management, Singapore and Dubai.   He has held leadership positions in IIM Ranchi , VIT, SRM, Great Lakes and Karunya University

on 28 May2020at 3.00 pm.

5/26/20, 11:16 PM - DR Sir WhatsApp No: Dear SRM family members..

“Success usually comes to those who are busy looking for it”.

Congratulations team SRM NCR on successfully accomplishing the objectives of the admission activities during the first juncture through telephonic interaction with prospective candidates. I appreciate and applaud the efforts of our *Deans, all the HoDs, Dr. Chandra Sharadha, Dr. Dhowmya Bhatt.and all the faculty members.* 🙏🏻🙏🏻

Expecting the same quality of dedication and enthusiasm exhibited earlier by our faculties, Webinar series have been planned for the interested candidates as a part of extension activity in the second juncture.

Dr. Pankaj Singh and Dr. Chandra Shaaradha will specifically inform certain faculties and these faculties shall alone in turn inform interested candidates who sounded positive during telephonic conversation to participate in these webinar’s. 
Faculties who are instructed  shall only share the Registration link and the poster with the interested candidates. 
As we are planning webinars every week, all the candidates who showed interest will eventually be called and accordingly the respective faculty who spoke to them will be intimated and instructed. 

I hope to see the same zeal and commitment from our faculties in motivating the candidates to participate in the webinar. With persistent hardwork, I am hopeful that we will achieve the target of 1560.
Once again I acknowledge your efforts and wish our team keeps up the good work.

Deputy Registrar

6/15/20, 4:56 PM - +91 99999 90901: *तनाव के उन क्षणों में मजबूत लोग भी आत्महत्या कर लेते हैं..*

वो लोग जिनके पास सब कुछ है ..
*शान ... शौकत ... रुतबा ... पैसा .. इज्जत* 
इनमें से कुछ भी उन्हें नहीं रोक पाता ..  

तो फिर क्या कमी रह जाती है ???

*कमी रह जाती है उस ऊँचाई पर एक अदद दोस्त की*

*कमी होती है  उस मुकाम पर एक अदद राजदार की*

*किसी छोटी सी चाय के दुकान पर भी बैठ सकते ..*

वह जिससे अपनी दिल की बात कह हल्के हो सके..
वह जिसको देखकर
अपना स्ट्रेस भूल सके

*वह दोस्त*
*वह यार* 
*वह राजदार* 
*वह हमप्याला*
उनके पास नहीं होता 
जो कह सके तू सब छोड़ ... *चाय पी मैं हूं ना तेरे साथ ...*
और आखिर में 
यही मायने कर जाता है...

सारी दुनिया की धन दौलत एकतरफ...सारा तनाव एक तरफ ..
*वह दोस्त वह एक तरफ !!!*

*लेकिन अगर आपके पास वह दोस्त है वह यार है*

*तो कीमत समझिये उसकी...* 

चले जाइए एक शाम उसके साथ चाय पर ... 
जिंदगी बहुत हसीन बन जाएगी...... 

*याद रखिए आपके तनाव से यदि कोई लड़ सकता है तो वो है आपका दोस्त और उसके साथ की एक कप गर्म चाय !!!*

6/15/20, 5:32 PM - +91 94118 44167: 👍👍
6/15/20, 5:50 PM - +91 99999 90901: 👍👍
6/15/20, 5:50 PM - +91 99999 90901: To all parents🙏

There was a very brilliant boy, he always scored 100% in Science.

Got Selected for IIT Madras and scored excellent in IIT.

Went to the University of California for MBA.
Got a high paying job in America and settled there.

Married a Beautiful Tamil Girl.

Bought a 5 room big house and luxury cars.
He had everything that make him successful but a few years ago he committed suicide after shooting his wife and children.

*WHAT WENT WRONG?*

California Institute of Clinical Psychology Studied his case and found *“what went wrong?”*

The researcher met the boy's friends and family and found that he lost his job due to America’s economic crisis and he had to sit without a job for a long time. 

After even reducing his previous salary amount, he didn't get any job. 

Then his house installment broke and he and his family lost the home. 

They survived a few months with less money and then he and his wife together decided to commit suicide. 

He first shot his wife and children and then shot himself.

The case concluded that the man was Programmed for *success* but he was not *trained for handling failures*.

Now let's come to the actual question.

*What are the habits of highly successful people?*

First of all, I want to tell you that if you have achieved everything, there is a chance to lose everything, nobody knows when the next economic crisis will hit the world. 

*The best success habit is getting trained for handling failures*.

I want to request every parent, please do not only program your child to be *successful* but *teach them how to handle failures* and also teach them proper lessons about life. 

Learning high-level science and maths will help them to clear competitive exams but a knowledge about life will help them to face every problem.

Teach them about how *money works* instead of teaching them to *work for money*. 

Help them in finding their passion because these degrees will not help them in the next economic crisis and we don’t know when the next crisis will hit the world.

*"Success is a lousy teacher. Failure teaches you more."*

6/24/20, 7:51 AM - +91 99999 90901: Greetings from School of Technology, Management & Engineering NMIMS, Indore.

Hope you all are keeping well! 

NMIMS Indore launches its first ever Technical Web-Series, *The Sunday Tech Series*. This will include webinars conducted every Sunday on different computer languages. Our last webinar was based on Basics of Java and was a huge success. This webinar is open to students who are interested to build their career in IT/ Management from class 10th to 12th as well as 1st and 2nd Year college students.

*Highlight of the Tech Series-II*
The webinar will start with the basics of Python and towards the end, we will acquire the knowledge and skill necessary for Python Development. We will be putting those skills to use in the creation of a small game.

📜 *Topic*: Getting started with Python 
👨‍🎤*Session Experts*: Mr. Dhanay Turakhia (Student of MBATech IV year) and Mr. Saksham Mehta (Students of MBATech III year) 
🏢*Date*: 21st June, 2020
⏰*Time*: 4 pm

*Mode of Delivery*: Cisco WebEx
📌*Registration Fees*: The webinar is FREE of cost.
📌*Registration Link*: https://forms.gle/gmW4JVP3uGvrS9XG9

📃 E Certificate will be provided at the end of the session. 

For further details contact :  
📞Dr. Nidhi Asthana: +91 6260817667
📞Utpal Agrawal: +91 94245 78317
✉️nm.techseries@gmail.com 

*Convener*: 
Dr. Aaquil Bunglowala
Associate Dean & Professor, STME, NMIMS, Indore

6/28/20, 6:45 PM - Bharati Chandrayan: This message was deleted
6/29/20, 11:48 AM - Dinesh Babu: Subject:IT Service Enhancement-NetID integration for E-Varsity.

Dear All,

Greetings from ITKM Team!!!

At ITKM we are working on a single-sign-on project since March-2019.

The objective of this project is to overcome the challenges facing by the organization/employee/students to manage multiple user ID & password for various applications, e-mail, networks, which is being used by SRM community over years.

We at ITKM receive numerous calls on resetting password, this is productivity loss for the users. An OTP based self service portal (https://ssp.srmist.edu.in) has been introduced in Jun`19. Anyone can reset password without any ITKM invention using this portal.

As initial step we have introduced NetID as single for every purpose. We have integrated NetID with E-mail & TeamDeck application & password reset portal. All future SRMIST application will be developed (i.e URP, mobile app) will be integrated with NetID.

As part of Single Sign On (SSO) initiative, from 1st July 2020 onwards you will be using your NetID credentials to login in E-Varsity.

The Existing employee id based username and password will not work for SRMIST user after 1st July 2020.

Thanks and Regards,
Dinesh Babu. K
Network Engineer & ERP In-charge

Dr Vikas Vidyarthi

6/30/20, 11:01 AM - Mahapatra Sir: *Greetings from Department of Computer Science & Engineering, SRM IST, Delhi-NCR Campus, Ghaziabad!!!*
 
Hope you are doing well and are safe in these trying times.
 
In view of the prevalent situation of COVID-19, “8th International Conference on Recent Trends in Computing (ICRTC-2020)” in association with SPRINGER"(ICRTC-2020) will be hosted online on 3rd & 4th July 2020.

*Invites you to the Online Inaugural Ceremony on 3rd July 2020, Friday at 9:00 AM*
 
May I request you to kindly connect online and grace the occasion with your presence. Your encourage has always been a source of inspiration to all of us.  Your presence during this event would go a long way in instilling the urge to do research amongst the younger generation and making it a success.
 
Zoom Meeting id : 4864535317
          pwd: 12345


With Best Regards
 
Dr. R. P. Mahapatra
Professor & HOD (CSE)
Dean Admissions, SRMIST, Delhi-NCR Campus, Ghaziabad 
Program Chair ICRTC-2020

7/12/20, 7:22 AM - +91 96399 57994: Covid Medical kit Required at home:

1. Paracetamol
2. Betadine for mouthwash and gargle
3. Vitamin C and D3 
5. B complex 
6. Vapour+ capsules for steam
7. Oximeter 
8. Oxygen cylinder (for emergency only)
9. arogya Setu app 
10.Breathing Exercises 

Covid Three stages:

1. Covid only in nose - recovery  time is half a day. (Steam inhaling), vitamin C. Usually no fever. Asymptomatic. 

2. Covid in throat - sore throat, recovery time 1 day (hot water gargle, warm water to drink, if temp then paracetamol. Vitamin C, Bcomplex. If severe than antibiotic. 

3. Covid in lungs- coughing and breathlessness 4 to 5 days. (Vitamin C, B complex, hot water gargle, oximeter, paracetamol, cylinder if severe, lot of liquid required, deep breathing exercise.

Stage when to approach hospital:
Monitor the oxygen level. If it goes near 43 (normal 98-100) then you need oxygen cylinder. If available at home, then no hospital else admit.

*Stay healthy, Stay Safe!*
 Please fwd to your contacts in India. You never know who it may help. 
Tata Group has started good initiative, they are providing free doctors consultation online through chats. This facility is started for you so that you need not to go out for doctors and you will be safe at home.

Below is the link, I reqest everyone to take benefit of this facility.
https://www.tatahealth.com/online-doctor-consultation/general-physician

Advice from inside isolation hospitals, we can do at home
 Medicines that are taken in isolation hospitals
 1. Vitamin C-1000
 2. Vitamin E (E)
 3. From (10 to 11) hours, sitting in the sunlight for 15-20 minutes.
 4. Egg meal once ..
 5. We take a rest / sleep a minimum of 7-8 hours
 6. We drink 1.5 liters of water daily
 7. All meals should be warm (not cold).
 And that's all we do in the hospital to strengthen the immune system

 Note that the pH of coronavirus varies from 5.5 to 8.5

 Therefore, all we have to do to eliminate the virus is to consume more alkaline foods above the acidity level of the virus.
 Such as :
 Bananas 
 Green lemon - 9.9 pH
 Yellow Lemon - 8.2 pH
 Avocado - 15.6 pH
 * Garlic - 13.2 pH
 * Mango - 8.7 pH
 * Tangerine - 8.5 pH
 * Pineapple - 12.7 pH
 * Watercress - 22.7 pH
 * Oranges - 9.2 pH

 How to know that you are infected with corona virus?

 1. Itchy throat
 2. Dry throat
 3. Dry cough
 4. High temperature
 5. Shortness of breath
 6. Loss of smell ....
 And lemon with warm water eliminates the virus at the beginning before reaching the lungs ...
 Do not keep this information to yourself. Provide it to all your family and friends.

2. Another way to play is that u can directly go to url www.kahoot.it
3. So try to keep 2 devices with u(in case u r not having 2 devices you can play with one too).

7/17/20, 4:47 PM - DR Sir WhatsApp No: Dear faculty members 

I am disappointed to witness the lethargic attitude of our faculty today when I found that many of them had not joined for the webinar. 
The institution has been closed considering your safety as our priority which doesn’t mean faculty will skip their responsibilities that needs to be discharged from home.  Especially when all these webinar’s are targeted towards admissions, there can be no excuses heard for not joining.

It’s not appreciable that faculty are disinterested and unsupportive in the institution level activities.
I advise all the concerned to take things seriously and the right time is now.

Deputy Registrar

7/19/20, 2:00 PM - Chandra Madam: Dear Sir/ Madam,

I am to inform you that *Admissions Process for the academic year 2020-21 at Delhi NCR Campus* Modinagar Ghaziabad has been started since 13.7.2020 (Monday).

it's becomes responsible for all of us to take intiative to work towards the Admissions activities.

You all are well aware that our *Admissions target for this academic year is 1512* for all programme together. 

In view of the above, it is to be informed that *the campus will reopen from 20th July 2020 ( Monday) onwards with full swing.* 

All the *faculties* are required to report as per *the Alternative days Schedule from 20.7.2020 *( including Delhi faculty and staff)* 

For *Non teaching staff the alternative days scheduled has been cancelled and all have to report to duty from 20.7.2020 onwards.* 

Hope all of us joined hands together _to achieve the Admissions target of 1512._ 

Thanking you regards

7/20/20, 12:29 PM - DR Sir WhatsApp No: Dear faculty members 

Please note and understand clearly the following -

Procedures for taking admission 

1. Immediate admission 
Students and parents can come to our campus with mark sheet with 50% in PCM for all engineering courses .

Tuition fee in the form of DD in favour of SRM IST payable at NewDelhi must be submitted.

Receipt can be taken immediately 

2. For those who cannot come personally and want to take admissions 
Mark sheet can be mailed to dean admissions 
Mail ID - dean.admissions.ncr@srmist.edu.in 

After verification of the marksheet and the student is found to have 50% in PCM he / she will be mailed asking to submit the fees. 

RTGS transcation can be done.Name: SRM Institute of Science and Technology
Bank Name: City Union Bank Ltd
Account No: 102109000066529
IFSC code: CIUB0000102
Address: 18/7, Arya Samaj Road, Karol Bagh, New Delhi - 110005

3. No- Paper admission process -

Admission can be taken through our website www.srmup.in
Fee can be paid online through our website.

This is applicable for all three admission procedures. Receipts will be provided for fee payment.

All faculty members and admission counsellors should understand this and explain approximately to candidates and parents.
Information given to aspirants should be crystal clear and ease their admission process.

Deputy Registrar

7/25/20, 6:53 PM - DR Sir WhatsApp No: Dear faculty members 

After going through the photographs that were taken yesterday for the new website, I feel that they are not professional enough because the faculty members despite having been given with prior information to come groomed properly have not paid heed to the instructions.

Only few of the faculty appear to have dressed appropriately and are presentable enough.

Therefore it has been decided to repeat the photo shoot. Faculty of Computer Science Engineering should come ready for the reshoot.

All faculty and staff members of the institution shall be dressed formally both on 27th and 28th for taking photographs adhering strictly to dress code given below-

Male Faculty- 
Coat -  Black, Brown or Blue
Plain shirt - white or blue colour only 
Tie and ID card

Female Faculty- 
Formal Saree & ID card 

Lab Technicians 
Shirt & Pant in formal colour and Tie.

As instructed on 23/7/2020, no leave of any form will be sanctioned on these two days.

The photo shoot is being done for our new website and sooner we provide these photos our website will be professional and full fledged.

 I shall personally be monitoring the whole photo shoot on these days. 

Please understand that we don’t have much time to be lethargic and this is a serious business. I hope things to be perfect on Monday so that neither of time gets wasted.

I expect each an everyone to cooperate sincerely.

Deputy Registrar

7/30/20, 10:25 AM - DR Sir WhatsApp No: *Very important decision by Modi Government*

New Education Policy 2020 is announced

1. 10+2 board structure is   dropped
2. New school structure will be 5+3+3+4
3. Upto 5 pre school, 6 to 8 Mid School, 8 to 11 High School , 12 onwards Graduation
4. Any Degree will be 4 years
5. 6th std onwards vocational courses available
6. From 8th to 11 students can choose subjects 
7. All graduation course will have major and minor
Example - science student can have Physics as Major and Music as minor also. Any combination he can choose
8. All higher education will be governed by only one authority. 
9. UGC AICTE will be merged.
10. All University government, private, Open, Deemed, Vocational etc will have same grading and other rules.
11. New Teacher Training board will be setup for all kinds of teachers in country, no state can change
12. Same level of Accreditation to any collage , based on its rating collage will get autonomous rights and funds.
13. New Basic learning program will be created by government for parents to teach children upto 3 years in home and for pre school 3 to 6
14. Multiple entry and exit from any course 
15. Credit system for graduation for each year student will get some credits which he can utilize if he takes break in course and come back again to complete course
16. All schools exams will be semester wise twise a year
17. The syllabus will be reduced to core knowledge of any subject only
18. More focus on student practical and application knowledge
19. For any graduation course if student complete only one year he will get a basic certificate, if he complete two years then he will get Diploma certificate and if he complete full course then he will get degree certificate. So no year of any student will ve vested if he break the course in between.
20.All the graduation course feed of all Universities will be govern by single authority with capping on each course.

Now we can hope our education system will be at par with moder countries and future of our children will be bright.

Kindly provide the official SRM IST e-mail password.

8/4/20, 8:21 PM - Dinesh Babu: Dear All,

The unscheduled maintenance activity has been completed and the SSP Service is back to normal.

We(ITKM) request you to forward the below mentioned process to students to reset their official mail-id password.

Kindly update your personal contact details (e-mail and contact number) in the Student Information Portal (e-varsity) for resetting password in the Self Service Portal (SSP).

E-varsity (Student Information Portal) URL: https://evarsity.srmist.edu.in/srmsip/

Self Service Portal URL: https://ssp.srmist.edu.in/

1. To update personal contact details in E-varsity

A. Login Student information portal (E-varsity) by using the username and password
B. Click updates menu --> Update Personal Contact.
C. To modify e-mail ID and contact number.
D. Click send OTP and then enter the OTP click submit

2. To reset official SRM IST e-mail password

A. Open https://ssp.srmist.edu.in/  in any browser.
B. Choose Reset Password after Enter your Net ID and captcha click Submit
C. Enter the masked letter in the mail id -->Click Send OTP and Enter the OTP --> Submit.
D. Create the New Password and Confirm Password -> Submit

Note: Please do not use your name as password and follow the password complexity as mentioned in Self Service Portal.

Thanks & regards
Dinesh Babu.K
Network Engineer and ERP (NCR Campus Co-ordinator) .

We have hosted today's webinar after a gap of 15 days.

This is very disappointing and will not solve the purpose of holding such  webinars which is purely for the sake of admission activities.

Where is the lacking?

Deputy Registrar
8/8/20, 6:44 PM - Pankaj Singh Jio: Respected Sir,

With due respect, I would like to say that, it is a very disgraceful issue of less attendance in the webinar.

It is really disappointing situation to get such response inspite of putting lots of efforts.

But, I will see to it that next time onwards each member of SRM family put 100% effort to make these admission events successful.

We really need to take strong action on it and I am assuring you on behalf of SRM family that we will bring more external participations next time.

Thanks & Regards

8/13/20, 9:47 AM - DR Sir WhatsApp No: Dear faculty and staff members 

I appreciate your enthusiasm and commitment in bringing maximum number of admissions to our campus this year. 

Your hard work shines bright in every single aspect, may it be calling, follow-up,counselling students and parents or answering their queries patiently.

After approaching the candidates who initially showed interest,300 students are willing to take admissions.

This 300 interested candidates should be followed up continuously and must be guided to take admissions in our campus. 

Please understand that they have only shown interest and now it’s our turn that we must show our interest in urging them take admissions in NCR campus.

So my advice and request to all of you is that we should not leave any stone unturned to convert this 300 interested candidates into admissions. 

Calls, messages, guidance and continuous follow up will make them feel that we are extremely keen about making them take admissions into our campus and this contagious enthusiasm will alone help us beat competition.

I trust the abilities of each member of team NCR and hope that they will convert each interested candidates into a SRMite of our campus. 

Deputy Registrar

8/16/20, 9:38 AM - DR Sir WhatsApp No: Dear Hods and Faculty member's

This is to inform you that we have planned to have one to one Zoom Meeting with the prospective aspirants of our NCR  campus who can be counselled at this point of time and thus making them take admissions at NCR campus.
The meeting will be held in batches of 20-25 candidates for a duration of 30 minutes. 
10 such batches will be counselled each day starting from tomorrow from 9.30am onwards.

The Zoom Meeting has been titled 
“ ADMISSION cum CAREER GUIDANCE”.

All our Deans will be present for the meeting and HoD, CDC & Placement will be in the meeting.

It is expected that one Hod should be present for each  meeting so that aspirants can meet and interact with the concerned in one single platform.

Dr. Chandra Shaaradha will share the details of the meeting with you.

The faculty members of all the departments have been calling these candidates who have opted for NCR Campus. It is advised that all the faculty should cooperate with madam Chandra as this is our last attempt in converting these candidates as admissions into NCR campus.

Deputy Registrar

Venkaiah Naidu, in the presence of Hon’ble Minister of Education - Shri Ramesh Pokhriyal ‘Nishank, Hon’ble Minister of State for Education - Shri Sanjay Shamrao Dhotre, Secretary- Higher Education - Shri Amit Khare & the Chairman AICTE - Prof. Anil Sahasrabudhe announced the Atal Ranking of Institutions on Innovation Achievements (ARIIA) 2020 EPSI happy to say that all are our Members.  

The following are under the category of Private or Self-Financing Universities: -

RANK: - 1 - Kalinga Institute of Industrial Technology
RANK: - 2 - SRM Institute of Science & Technology
RANK: - 3 - Vellore Institute of Technology
RANK: - 4 - Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham
RANK: - 5 - Sathyabama Institute of Science and Technology

The following are under the category of Private or Self-Financing Colleges/Institutions: - 
RANK: - 2 - Sri Krishna College of Engineering and Technology
RANK: - 4 - Sri Krishna College of Technology
RANK: - 5 - CMR College of Engineering & Technology

EPSI Congratulates all the Member Institutions for this Great Achievement.

8/19/20, 2:37 PM - Mahapatra Sir: Department of Computer Science & Engineering, SRMIST, Delhi-NCR Campus, Ghaziabad  is organizing a Webinar on “AWS Educate, AWS Certification and AWS Resources”, on Sunday, 23rd Aug 2020 at 10:00 AM. This webinar is for meant for all faculty members, students and research scholars of all streams. The aim of the webinar is  to create awareness  of AWS Educate website, Identify and  Monitor  AWS Resource  requirements and its usage for research  and development by various faculty members, research scholars and students.  The webinar will also provide guidelines to be  followed for acquiring various AWS Certification.
On completion of the webinar all the participations are requested to fill the appropriate Google form link given below to list down  their requirements of AWS resources.
All the participants are requested to use their official mail id for joining this webinar.

Meeting details are give below:  
Sunday, 23rd Aug 2020 at 10:00AM. 
https://meet.google.com/buv-vdth-rij

Google form for Faculty:
https://tinyurl.com/yyaz6lh7
 
Google form for Students:
https://tinyurl.com/yy46cpwx

Google form for Research Scholar:
https://tinyurl.com/y5ccx5kq

Resource Person
Dr. Veena Khandelwal
Dr. Pritee Parwekar

8/23/20, 9:21 AM - +91 94133 50811: Department of Computer Science & Engineering, SRMIST, Delhi-NCR Campus, Ghaziabad  is organizing a Webinar on “AWS Educate, AWS Certification and AWS Resources”, on Sunday, 23rd Aug 2020 at 10:00 AM. This webinar is for meant for all faculty members, students and research scholars of all streams. The aim of the webinar is  to create awareness  of AWS Educate website, Identify and  Monitor  AWS Resource  requirements and its usage for research  and development by various faculty members, research scholars and students.  The webinar will also provide guidelines to be  followed for acquiring various AWS Certification.
On completion of the webinar all the participations are requested to fill the appropriate Google form link given below to list down  their requirements of AWS resources.
All the participants are requested to use their official mail id for joining this webinar.

Meeting details are give below:  
Sunday, 23rd Aug 2020 at 10:00AM. 
https://meet.google.com/buv-vdth-rij

Google form for Faculty:
https://tinyurl.com/yyaz6lh7
 
Google form for Students:
https://tinyurl.com/yy46cpwx

Google form for Research Scholar:
https://tinyurl.com/y5ccx5kq

Resource Person
Dr. Veena Khandelwal
Dr. Pritee Parwekar

The pillars of a happy office are not made from cement but from the enthusiastic colleague and friends like you.

Management books can never teach you real teamwork. Only efficient person like you can. 

 I’m grateful to you for so many reasons. 

Happy birthday to the most amazing person in the world!

Best wishes
Viswanathan

9/5/20, 9:26 AM - DR Sir WhatsApp No: Dear Respected teachers...

On the occasion of Teachers Day, here is a wishing to the most amazing teaching fraternity of NCR campus. Hai
I feel lucky to be a part this community of teachers committed to excellence in education, selflessly dedicated, energetic and enthusiastic in their mission.
I am proud that all the faculties are multitasking and stand true to the good sprit of being a teacher and mentor, which is the best act of optimism. Our students are what they are today because of you. 

I wish all of you to keep up the good work that you have been doing for many many years and will have only the best in all you future endeavours.
A very happy TEACHERS DAY to SRM family.

💐🙏🏻💐💐🙏🏻🙏🏻🙏🏻

9/5/20, 9:55 AM - SRM Verbal Dr Jayprakash: एक शिक्षक और एक छात्र के रूप में जीवन और दुनिया (प्रकृति और लोगों सहित) के बीच एक बहुत ही अनूठा संबंध है क्योंकि यह दुनिया ही मुझे जीवन का सार सिखाती है। मेरे जीवन में हर कोई मुझे कुछ सिखाता है, जैसे एक तूफान के दौरान, प्रकृति हमेशा मुझे शांति का पाठ पढ़ाती है, पहाड़ मुझे सिखाते हैं कि कैसे मजबूत होना चाहिए, पानी का प्रवाह मुझे अपने काम में लगातार रहना सिखाता है। उसी तरह, मेरे आसपास के लोग मुझे हर पल कुछ नया सिखा रहे हैं, उन सभी को शिक्षक दिवस की बहुत बहुत शुभकामनाएं।

9/17/20, 8:39 AM - Chandra Madam: Congratulations sir
9/17/20, 8:39 AM - Naresh Sharma: *A very interesting story*

One Sunday morning, a wealthy man sat in his balcony enjoying sunshine and his coffee when a little ant caught his eye which was going from one side to the other side of the balcony carrying a big leaf several times more than its size.

 The man watched it for more than an hour. He saw that the ant faced many obstacles during its journey, paused, took a diversion and then continued towards destination.

At one point the tiny creature came across a crack in the floor. It paused for a little while, analyzed and then laid the huge leaf over the crack, walked over the leaf, picked the leaf on the other side then continued its journey.

The man was captivated by the cleverness of the ant, one of God’s tiniest creatures. The incident left the man in awe and forced him to contemplate over the miracle of Creation. It showed the Greatness of the Creator. 

In front of his eyes there was this tiny creature of God, lacking in size yet equipped with a brain to analyze, contemplate, reason, explore, discover and overcome.

A while later the man saw that the creature had reached its destination – a tiny hole in the floor which was entrance to its underground dwelling.

 And it was at this point that the ant’s shortcoming that it shared with the man was revealed. 

How could the ant carry into the tiny hole the large leaf that it had managed to carefully bring to the destination? It simply couldn't! So the tiny creature, after all the painstaking and hard work and exercising great skills, overcoming all the difficulties along the way, just left behind the large leaf and went home empty-handed.

The ant had not thought about the end before it began its challenging journey and in the end the large leaf was nothing more than a burden to it. 

The creature had no option, but to leave it behind to reach its destination. 

The man learned a great lesson that day.

That is the truth about our lives too.

We worry about our family, we worry about our job, we worry about how to earn more money, we worry about where we should live, what kind of vehicle to buy, what kind of dresses to wear, what gadgets to upgrade, only to abandon all these things when we reach our destination – We don’t realize in our life’s journey that these are just burdens that we are carrying with utmost care and fear of losing them, only to find that at the end they are useless and we can’t take them with us.....

🙏🙏🙏

9/21/20, 1:15 PM - +91 93548 77129: Dear All, 

Computer Society of India (CSI) is now active in SRM Institute of Science and Technology, Delhi NCR Campus.
*We need to form a CSI Student Chapter at our campus*
for which I would request all HODs of  various branches to circulate google form (link is given with this msg) and poster of CSI among all students. Interested students can fill up the form.
I would also request all of you to motivate students to come forward and be a part of CSI so that we all can work as one team.
We are trying to do publicity on social media through Instagram, Facebook and LinkedIn.
I am sharing the links of social Medias with this message, 
I would request you to like the page and tell the same to students
Information of CSI
ABOUT:
Computer Society of India (CSI) is the first and largest body of computer professionals in India. It was started on 6 March 1965 by a few computer professionals and has now grown to be the national body representing computer professionals.

VISION:
The Computer Society of India is a non-profit professional society and meet to exchange views and information learn and share ideas. The wide spectrum of members is committed to the advancement of theory and practice of Computer Engineering and Technology Systems, Science and Engineering, Information Processing and related Arts and Sciences.

MISSION:
- Facilitate Research, Knowledge Sharing, Learning and Career Enhancement among all categories of IT professionals.
- Inspire, nurture and assist students to integrate into the IT community.
- Percolate benefits of IT advancement to all sections of Indian Society.

Important Links:
Instagram: https://instagram.com/teamcsi_srm?igshid=nt1uftgl7uja
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/csi-srmncr
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TeamCsiSrmNcr/
Join by filling the Google form: https://forms.gle/9MJoh7uzW8PNw6jj6

10/5/20, 1:13 PM - +91 93548 77129: Dear Friends,

Computer Society of India (CSI) local Chapter SRM Institute of Science & Technology, Delhi NCR Campus Ghaziabad   in association with AWS Academy, SRM Institute of Science & Technology, Delhi NCR Campus Ghaziabad are organizing 30 hours hands on training workshop on AWS Academy Cloud  Foundation Course leading to AWS Cloud Practitioner Certification. 

*Date:* 26 Oct - 7 Nov (Tentative)
*Time:* 3:30PM - 4:30PM
*Trainer:* AWS Accredited Instructor Dr. Veena Khandelwal

*Eligibility:* Open for all 

**** *First Come First Serve Basis* ****

*Fees:* Free of cost

*Batch size:* 70-80 Students

*Platform:* Google Meet

*Benefits:* After the completion of the workshop participants are required to appear for AWS certification exam which has  certification fee of 100 USD. Participants of the workshops will  get a discount coupon of 50% on AWS Certification Fee to appear for exam and  one free practice test voucher worth 20 USD. The participants can also participate in AWS Virtual Job Fair which will be held in October end.  

Interested candidates are requested to fill the form: https://forms.gle/n2K9scjfj4AasAAh6

*Course Outline:*
Module 1.1 - Cloud Concepts Overview
Module 1.2 - Cloud Economics
Module 1.3 - AWS Infrastructure Overview
Module 2.1 - AWS Core Services: Compute
Module 2.2 - AWS Core Services: Storage
Module 2.3 - AWS Core Services – Amazon Virtual Private Cloud
Module 2.4 - AWS Core Services: Databases
Module 2.5 - AWS Core Services: Elastic Load Balancing, Amazon CloudWatch, and Auto Scaling
Module 3 - AWS Cloud Security
Module 4 - Cloud Architecting
Module 5 - Cloud Billing and Support

*Do Connect With Us:*

*CSI Website:* www.csisrmncr.in
*Instagram:* https://instagram.com/teamcsi_srm?igshid=nt1uftgl7uja
*Facebook:* https://www.facebook.com/TeamCsiSrmNcr/
*LinkedIn:* https://www.linkedin.com/company/csi-srmncr

Good Luck 👍
Team CSI-SRMNCR

Greetings from SRMAP. Hope this mail finds you well.
On the Eve of Navratri SRMAP  is organizing NATYASWARA- An inter college Dance and Singing competition for students.
1st Prize- 2000
2nd Prize-1500
we also have three consolation prizes
1st consolation 500
2nd consolation 500
3rd consolation 500

The selected videos will be screened on 17th- Singing and 18th.
The number of rounds will be based on the number of videos submitted.
If the number of submissions are more, the selected participants will have to submit the second video by 22nd Oct for final selection.
For any clarification and queries please contact the numbers given in the registration form or at the end of the rules 

Please find attached the rules to participate in the event.

Last date to upload the videos -16/10/2020

 ```Hope this message finds you in Good Health and Spirit!!!``` 

AICTE Training and Learning (ATAL) is conducting a series of online FDPs-2020. In this perspective, SRM Institute of Science and Technology, Delhi-NCR CAMPUS, Ghaziabad is going to organize an AICTE sponsored faculty development programme on *“Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning”* during 19th – 23th, October 2020 by online.

There is no registration fee for the programme. The potential participants are required to register at *https://atalacademy.aicte-india.org/signup* 

1. Registered as a participant → Fill your details

2. Select workshop → *Uttar Pradesh →Month → October→ Thrust area → Engineering →   Online Mode*

3. Select Institute → *SRM Institute of Science and Technology, Delhi-NCR CAMPUS,    Ghaziabad (Application No: 1584344851)* 

May I request your kind support and consideration to share the information to your contacts - faculty, research scholars and students who might be interested.

*Note: Already Registered means please ignored*

10/20/20, 9:59 AM - DR Sir WhatsApp No: Dear Nitin

The basic purpose of media coverage for any programme is to broadcast our campus activities amongst public. However this task should be done appropriately.

Whenever any activities may it be co-curricular or extracurricular, the focus should be on the invited guest and not the internal members of our campus.
For instance, the photo of the chief guest for the FDP Programme Prof Rajat Gupta should have been on the news instead of mine.

The Director of NIT Mizoram being present for our programme is the news and this is what people want to see and listen from a brand like us.

The news of FDP with my photograph is totally mindless. 

Therefore in all future Campus activities and programmes where news / photographs are being sent to media, prior permission should be taken from my office. 
Without approvals no photographs shall be sent to media.

All the Hods and event coordinators should note this and adhere without deviations. 


Deputy Registrar

10/24/20, 2:33 PM - Yogesh Kushwaha: 👍👍👍
10/24/20, 5:15 PM - +91 94133 50811: Dear Students,

Team ISTE 'SRM is very happy to invite first year students to participate in one of the biggest annual event by us. We present to you the event *Mock Placement '20 + workshop on competitive programming*. Mock Placement will give you the experience of how real placements happen. Their will be a exclusive workshop on competitive programming after the Mock Placement. Please find various details about event and ISTE below.

*WHAT IS ISTE?*
I.S.T.E (Indian Society for Technical Education) is a national, professional, non-profit making, government aided society, started in 1941 as the "Association of Principals of Technical Education (A.P.T.I)". The Students' chapter of ISTE was started in 2007 in our campus.

*OUR VISION AND MISSION:*
Colleges only focusing on theoretical knowledge and not on what the industry really expects from a professional, ISTE'S main objective is to assist and contribute in the production and development of the professionals in the industry. We conduct many events which target a particular set of skills which help in developing general logic, perception and creativity among the students, like workshops for embedded systems, digital marketing, programming languages like C++, Java, HTML, various quizzes, Forums and much more. In a nutshell I.S.T.E has striven to make every student at par with any other professional of that particular field.


*Please refer to various details below about the event:* 👇

*Mock Placement *+ Workshop(Competitive Programming) :* You should attend this Mock Placement event because it will give you an idea about the placement process so that you don't have to see it on YouTube, attend webinars or contact seniors to know about it. You can simply attend the event and get to know everything about it. Also we have 2 days workshop on Competitive Programming provided by our official partner *REGex*, for you all where you'll be taught competitive programming from basic to top level along with hands-on practice. 

*Date:* 👇
    *Mock Placement:*
     27 October, 2020 - aptitude (technical + general)
     28 October, 2020 - coding round
     29 October, 2020 - group discussion
     31 October, 2020 - interview

    *Workshop:*
     7 & 8 November, 2020

**Certificates:*👇
 1) E-Certificate of Appreciation for winners
 2) E-Certificate of Participation for all participants

Free of cost. Just experience placement and win exciting prizes

26 October,2020

10/25/20, 10:27 AM - Naveen Ahlawat: विजयादशमी इस बात की प्रतीक है कि असत्य के रावण का सत्य के 'राम' द्वारा अंत निश्चित है।विजयादशमी का महापर्व मनुष्य को अधर्म, अहंकार और असत्य का परित्याग कर धर्म, विवेक और सत्य के मार्ग पर चलने की प्रेरणा व शिक्षा देने वाला पर्व है।

अत्याचार पर सदाचार, पाप पर पुण्य, दम्भ पर विनम्रता, क्रोध पर करुणा, आसुरी प्रवृत्ति पर सद्वृत्तियों की विजय के महापर्व विजयादशमी की सभी को अनन्त शुभकामनाएं
प्रभु श्री राम हमें बुराइयों पर विजय प्राप्त करने की शक्ति दें।

'विजयादशमी' की हार्दिक शुभकामनाएँ 

जय श्री राम!

सियावर रामचंद्र की जय!
